name: BreakQuest: Extra Evolution
description:
BreakQuest is back and is twice the fun! Stunning visuals and shapes, energizing physics and exciting sounds! Enjoy 100 сompletely redesigned action-packed levels, each featuring own colorful design, elements behavior and visual effects. An advanced physics and collision system gives a never-seen-before experience for your pleasure. And don’t forget about weapons and power-up bonuses as well as the amazing Gravitor which attracts the ball to you. Breaking bricks has never been so fun!

This item is being licensed or sublicensed to you by Sony Computer Entertainment America and is subject to the Network Terms of Service and User Agreement, this item’s use restrictions and other applicable terms located at www.us.playstation.com/support/useragreements. If you do not wish to accept all these terms, do not download this item. This item may be used with up to 2 activated PlayStation®3 systems and 2 portable systems associated with this Sony Entertainment Network account.
